item.title: 个人常用工具集
item.author: zanran2046@gmail.com (素问)
item.description: 开发必备工具 VSCode Website: https://code.visualstudio.com/ 简介：This is the only editor which I used for my develop career since vscode released. Visual Studio Code is a lightweight but powerful source code editor which runs on your desktop and is available for Windows, macOS and Linux. It comes with built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js and has a rich ecosystem of extensions for other languages and runtimes (such as C++, C#, Java, Python, PHP, Go, .
